https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vVBrzBwYh8g3NcQPJrAvtVAqdCF.jpg Documentary about the group of people gathered in 1991 who call themselves "Doutores da Alegria" (Doctors of Joy). They dress as clowns and go to the hospitals to bring some comfort to young patients. Doutores da Alegria
